channel.title: Server status like
channel.description:
do you want a server status like Rune-server? rune soft? or moparscape
only works on Vbulltien sites
what works 100% !
well this is what u do
download this http://www.megaupload.com/?d=P88GALGG
now add them to /includes/datastore/
add a foldar called status and add them 3 files in there
now go to your site and add on the portal a new page Serverlist and then press ctrl and f and find
Path to File Here you may specify the path to a file to include which will replace the content of your 'Custom Page Content' module.
now add there ./includes/datastore/status/index.php
now add a other new page and call it Manage your server and now find
Path to File Here you may specify the path to a file to include which will replace the content of your 'Custom Page Content' module. add ./includes/datastore/status/addedit.php
NOW in ur con change the YOUR MYSQL NAME to ur mysql name YOUR MYSQL password change that to ur pass then the name again then ur mysql url nomaly at the bottum of ur set up page YOUR MYSQL demo http://rune-cheatsss.freehostia.com/index.php?page=addedit http://rune-cheatsss.freehostia.com/index.php?page=serverlist

item.title: Server status like
item.dc:creator: @darkflare81 darkflare81
item.description:
@darkflare81 wrote:

I keep gettin this error can someone plz help me with it

Warning: require_once() [function.require-once]: Unable to access ./includes/vba_cmps_include_template.php in /hosted/subs/ulmb.com/p/r/projectforums/public_html/cmps_index.php on line 44

Warning: require_once(./includes/vba_cmps_include_template.php) [function.require-once]: failed to open stream: Invalid argument in /hosted/subs/ulmb.com/p/r/projectforums/public_html/cmps_index.php on line 44

Fatal error: require_once() [function.require]: Failed opening required ‘./includes/vba_cmps_include_template.php’ (include_path=’.:’) in /hosted/subs/ulmb.com/p/r/projectforums/public_html/cmps_index.php on line 44

and runescape3dude what rre u talkin abot this already makes a mysql table in the database lol

Read full topic

item.title: Server status like
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

This status checker is anti-scam by gander, you need to either have your site added to ganders mysql database (so it lets the status checker work), or remove that feature.

Read full topic

"now go to your site and add on the portal a new page
Serverlist
and then press ctrl and f and find

Path to File
Here you may specify the path to a file to include which will replace the content of your ‘Custom Page Content’ module.

add ./includes/datastore/status/addedit.php"

item.title: Server status like
item.dc:creator: @S_ms S!ms
item.description:
@S_ms wrote:

Sorry, there is a problem, did u fill in a wrong ip or port? Or is your server Offline,
Due to spam reasons, your server has to be ONLINE before you can add a server.

afaik google.com:80 is online…

Read full topic
